name: Mischief Man
description:
Mischief Man Is the hero the city never needed or wanted.

In this game you play as a very Mischievous Man who steals the stuff from citizens with a sticky hand

Made in 2 days with Original  CREATIVE  assets (99% of assets are mine, you can guess which one isn't)

Controls; pull sticky-hand back and fling at the passerbys
